description: Update a job production plan status change.
permissions: Allowed for users who can update the associated job production plan (uses the JobProductionPlan policy update? on the linked plan).
side_effects: Updates can trigger status change notifications and related subscriber notifications via an after-commit notification hook.
validation_notes: The status change ID argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided; only job_production_plan_cancellation_reason_type is updatable. job_production_plan_cancellation_reason_type must be absent unless the status is cancelled or scrapped. Use an empty string to clear the cancellation reason type.

flags.name: --job-production-plan-cancellation-reason-type
flags.validation: Use an empty string to clear the cancellation reason type.
